item.title: Morning Mail Service to be Suspended During Holiday/Winter Break
item.description: DotCIO’s Web Services team asks the campus community to note that the daily Morning Mail service will be on temporary hiatus from Monday, December 23, 2024 through Wednesday, January 1, 2025, while the Institute is closed for its annual holiday/winter break.
item.author: Community

item.title: DotCIO Schedules License Server Maintenance for December 23
item.description: On Monday, December 23 between 8am to 8pm ET, DotCIO will be performing maintenance on the license servers used for software activation on campus. During this time, license servers will be restarted and those who use the software that utilize these license servers may temporarily experience license activation issues.
item.author: Community

item.title: Erel, Moriarity Receive ACADIA Design Award
item.description: Assistant Professor Yael Erel and Lecturer Claire Moriarty recently received the Best Project Award for their project Augmenting Reflectors – SPSF Reflector Fabrication presented at ACADIA 2024 Designing Change Conference. This project explores reflecting dynamic light caustics off of augmented mirrored sheets, and manifests a multi-layered design for change.

item.title: Bay Area RPI School of Architecture Alumni Experience to be Held January 27
item.description: School of Architecture alumni are invited to attend the first-ever Bay Area RPI School of Architecture Alumni Experience, scheduled to be held from 6PM to 8PM on Monday, January 27, 2025, when Chuck Oraftik ’66 has graciously arranged for attendees to gather at his former firm, HOK Inc., in San Francisco. Space is limited; RSVP ASAP and no later than January 20, 2025!
item.author: Community

item.title: DotCIO Schedules Server Upgrades for December 21, 22
item.description:
DotCIO will be performing necessary server upgrades over the winter break. From midnight through 11:59pm on Saturday, December 21, an update to IACSDept.win.rpi.edu will affect S drive for campus and V drive for departments. An update to IACSHome.win.rpi.edu from 9:00am to 1:00pm on Sunday, December 22 will affect all U drives (home directories).

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
